channel.title: Compile.bat error
channel.description:
I'm new to this, and YES, I HAVE USED THE SEARCH BAR, NOTHING HELPED ME. Everytime i try to run compile.bat, I get this error when I have
[code]@echo off javac *.java pause[/code]
[code]'Javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...[/code]
my runserver.bat says
[code]@echo off COLOR 08 title bobscape "J:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "J:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin/java.exe" server pause[/code]
but i can start my server fine, i just can't use compile.bat
I have set up PATH and CLASSPATH by the way.
Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Compile.bat error
item.dc:creator: @brenda brenda
item.description:
@brenda wrote:

PushedPrawn:

I’m about 80% sure this is a Environmental Variable error… Correct me if I’m wrong though. Your Environmental Variables need to be correctly set up with the right JDK version.

ABSOLUTELY 100% CORRECT. Beat me to the punch lol was gonna say that was problem, good of someone else to know it =)

Read full topic

item.title: Compile.bat error
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

when a compiler doesn’t work for me, i just get one that does and replace it.

Read full topic

item.title: Compile.bat error
item.dc:creator: @roflurdead roflurdead
item.description:
@roflurdead wrote:

Nope, i checked my enviromental variables and they are the correct version. i also checked my java folder and java.exe and javac.exe are both there

item.title: Compile.bat error
item.dc:creator: @roflurdead roflurdead
item.description:
@roflurdead wrote:

I’m new to this, and YES, I HAVE USED THE SEARCH BAR, NOTHING HELPED ME. Everytime i try to run compile.bat, I get this error when I have

@echo off javac *.java pause

'Javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...

my runserver.bat says

@echo off COLOR 08 title bobscape "J:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "J:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin/java.exe" server pause

but i can start my server fine, i just can’t use compile.bat

I have set up PATH and CLASSPATH by the way.

Any help would be appreciated.

Read full topic
